name: Baiana Plana
introduction: Born in Buenos Aires, but with germanic and portuguese roots on her father´s side and hispanic-argentinian on mother´s side.Her first short film “La tragedia del hombre hueco” won many awards all around the world. (Arouca Film Festival (Portugal), Festival Montevideo Fantástico (Uruguay), Portobello Film Festival (United Kingdom), Xarrades en Curt (Spain)). She has also worked in theatre under the actor´s master Juan Carlos Corazza´s direction in “Cuando yo pueda olvidar” a work inspired by Ernest Hemingway´s tales and “Promesas” inspired in Picnic by William Inge.During her 7 years of acting she has studied in studios as “La escuela Off de teatro y Cine” (Valencia), Teatro musical en la “Escuela Escalante” (Valencia), “La escuela del Actor” (Valencia) y “Estudio Juan Carlos Corazza” (Madrid).Now she lives in New York where she continues her studies at "The Barrow Group New York".
